content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position x=0.0-2.0, y=0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working on iron ore:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel and iron ore processing
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel and iron ore processing

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4.0, y=4.0)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore:
- Furnace at (4,4) with coal fuel and copper ore processing

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Production line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-28.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting components:
  - Water pipes at (-9.5,23.5), (-8.5,23.5), (-8.5,22.5), (-7.5,22.5)
  - Steam pipe at (-5.5,24.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network connecting various parts of the factory

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors accessing non-existent lab
- Ensure the lab entity exists at position (0.5, 28.5) before trying to access it
- Verify lab placement and coordinates before attempting operations

### Resource shortage errors
- Monitor assembler ingredient levels - electronic circuit production halted due to missing iron plates and copper cables
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials to production lines

### Coal management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler and furnaces to prevent energy shortages
- Implement better coal distribution system when reserves are low
